sdk.entities.context.builder#

Context builder module.

class sdk.entities.context.builder.ContextBuilder#

Bases: object

The context builder. It implements the builder pattern to create a context instance. It allows to use multiple projects at the same time.

Methods

build(project_object)

Add a project to the context.

get(project)

Get a project from the context.

remove(project)

Remove a project from the context.
build(project_object: Project) → None#

Add a project to the context.

Parameters:
projectProject

The project to add.

Returns:
None
get(project: str) → Context#

Get a project from the context.

Parameters:
projectstr

The project name.

Returns:
Context

The project context.

remove(project: str) → None#

Remove a project from the context.

Parameters:
projectstr

The project name.

Returns:
None
